request.description:
Description:
Register a new node.

Parameters:

responsibleId:  M  ‘id_acc’ | ‘namespace/nmlogin’
nodeType:  M  ENUM - Valid Node_Type
externalId:  M  string
ownershipMode:  M  ENUM - Valid Ownership_Mode
nodeStatus:  M  ENUM - Valid Node_Status
orderId:  O  String
settlementId:  O  ‘id_acc’ | ‘namespace/nmlogin’
startDate:  M  ECB Timestamp
node  M/O  String – valid json string for NodeType

Example:
Body:
{
 "responsibleId": "135306",
 "externalId": "CA891046140ox",
 "ownershipMode": "DAAS",
 "nodeStatus": "ACTIVE",
 "orderId": "FUG903",
 "startDate": "2019-08-26T00:00:00Z",
 "node": {
  "nodeType": "CAMERA",
  "attributes": {
   "msisdn": "9196558778",
   "imsi": "3256845127882",
   "oem": "Sony",
   "model": "OX_800_b",
   "location": "Park_loc_3423",
   }
 }
}

Parameters

Description:
Changes the payer of a node per requested start date. The node is to be identified via node.nodeType and externalID. A valid new payerID is required and requested start date cannot be for closed intervals for either old or new payer. Only a single Payer request change for a node on any given day is allowed.

Additional attributes passed – either via direct parameters or via node.attributes – are reflected in the update node, given they pass the schema evaluation.

Parameters:

ResponsibleId:  M  ‘id_acc’ | ‘namespace/nmlogin’
nodeType:  M  ENUM - Valid Node_Type
externalId:  M  string
ownershipMode:  M  ENUM - Valid Ownership_Mode
nodeStatus:  M  ENUM - Valid Node_Status
orderId:  O  String
settlementId:  O  ‘id_acc’ | ‘namespace/nmlogin’
startDate:  M  ECB Timestamp
node  M/O  String – valid json string for NodeType

Example:
Body:
{
 "ResponsibleId": "135306",
 "externalId": "CA891046140ox",
 "startDate": "2019-08-26T00:00:00Z",
 "node": {
  "nodeType": "CAMERA",
  "attributes": {
   }
 }
}

Description:
Changes the payer of a node per requested start date. The node is to be identified via node.nodeType and externalID. A valid new payerID is required and requested start date cannot be for closed intervals for either old or new payer. Only a single Payer request change for a node on any given day is allowed.

Additional attributes passed – either via direct parameters or via node.attributes – are reflected in the update node, given they pass the schema evaluation.

Parameters:

ResponsibleId:  M  ‘id_acc’ | ‘namespace/nmlogin’
nodeType:  M  ENUM - Valid Node_Type
externalId:  M  string
ownershipMode:  M  ENUM - Valid Ownership_Mode
nodeStatus:  M  ENUM - Valid Node_Status
orderId:  O  String
settlementId:  O  ‘id_acc’ | ‘namespace/nmlogin’
startDate:  M  ECB Timestamp
node  M/O  String – valid json string for NodeType

Example:
Body:
{
 "ResponsibleId": "135306",
 "externalId": "CA891046140ox",
 "startDate": "2019-08-26T00:00:00Z",
 "node": {
  "nodeType": "CAMERA",
  "attributes": {
   }
 }
}

Description:
Changes the payer of a node per requested start date. The node is to be identified via node.nodeType and externalID. A valid new payerID is required and requested start date cannot be for closed intervals for either old or new payer. Only a single Payer request change for a node on any given day is allowed.

Additional attributes passed – either via direct parameters or via node.attributes – are reflected in the update node, given they pass the schema evaluation.

Available Node Statuses:
ACTIVE
SUSPENDED
TERMINATED



Example:
Body:
{
 "externalId": "CA891046140ox",
 "startDate": "2019-08-26T00:00:00Z",
 "node": {
  "nodeType": "CAMERA",
  }
  "nodeStatus": "SUSPENDED"
}

Description:
Changes the payer of a node per requested start date. The node is to be identified via node.nodeType and externalID. A valid new payerID is required and requested start date cannot be for closed intervals for either old or new payer. Only a single Payer request change for a node on any given day is allowed.

Additional attributes passed – either via direct parameters or via node.attributes – are reflected in the update node, given they pass the schema evaluation.

Available Node Statuses:
ACTIVE
SUSPENDED
TERMINATED



Example:
Body:
{
 "externalId": "CA891046140ox",
 "startDate": "2019-08-26T00:00:00Z",
 "node": {
  "nodeType": "CAMERA",
  }
  "nodeStatus": "SUSPENDED"
}
